Package heapclasses

Class BinaryHeap

    • Constructor Detail

      • BinaryHeap

        public BinaryHeap()

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public void insert​(Entity newEntity,
                   int priority)
        Creates a new node holding the given entity and inserts it into the heap. If the heap is empty, update the root of the heap as the newly created node. Otherwise, insert it at the end of the heap and make sure to heapify the node based on the entity's priority.
        Parameters:
        newEntity - The entity to be held by the node
        priority - The priority of the entity

      • embark

        public void embark()
        Removes the root of the heap and heapifies it accordingly

      • list

        public void list()
        Prints the ID's of the entities currently in the heap. Follows pre-order traversal.

      • delete

        public void delete​(Entity newEntity)
        If the given entity has a person with a set name, find the node containing the entity with the corresponding ID and delete that person from it. If the name is not set, delete the whole entity found.
        Parameters:
        newEntity - An entity containing a person with a possible set name

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if the root node is not present (the heap is empty)
